column5: Hello everyone- first time posting here for me.  My son and I are heading to Big Vermillion week of 6/11.  Can anyone point us in the right direction on that lake.  We are most intersted in Pike fishing, have fished Lac Seul out of Mahkwa Lodge the last two years, but couldn't get in there his year.  We are willing to travel to nearby lakes also.  Thanks in advance for your help.
Can't help ya none here.. but with a name like "Big Red" you can't go wrong!!!
